metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9403 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The CWebAdminMod::ChanPage function in modules/webadmin.cpp in ZNC before1.4 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (NULLpointer dereference and crash) by adding a channel with the same name as anexisting channel but without the leading # character, related to a"use-after-delete" error.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9403` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

znc - 1.2-3ubuntu0.1
znc-perl - 1.2-3ubuntu0.1
znc-python - 1.2-3ubuntu0.1
znc-tcl - 1.2-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: znc package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2-3ubuntu0.1').
